verse.name: v1
verse.lines: In the quiet, in the stillness I know that you are God newline In the secret of your presence I know there I am restored, newline When you call I won't refuse newline Each new day again I'll choose...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is no one else for me, newline None but Jesus, newline Crucified to set me free, newline Now I live to bring you Praise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In the chaos, in confusion I know youre sovereign still newline in the moment of my weakness newline You give me grace to do your will

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When you call I wont delay newline This my song through all my days..

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All my delight is in you Lord newline All of my hope, newline All of my strength.. newline All my delight is in you Lord, newline Forever more.
